  • Method Details

    • setAction

      public void setAction​(Server server, SocketClientConnection socket, SetUp setupper)
      Creates a new Room and adds it to the default Server Room list. It also stores the connection of the player who sent the Setupper. If the Room is meant to be for a single player It also starts the game moving the room from the default server room list to the active server room list.
      Specified by:
      setAction in interface Settable
      Parameters:
      server -
      socket -
      setupper -

    • canSetAction

      public boolean canSetAction​(Server server, SetUp setupper)
      A room can be created if its name is never used.
      Specified by:
      canSetAction in interface Settable
      Parameters:
      server -
      setupper -
      Returns:
      true if the room name is never used.
